about_the_game:
Embark on a journey into the future of AI-powered conversations with our innovative 3D chatbot experience.

Important: We offer a demo version of Replikant Chat. Each month, we provide credits for a brief experience, allowing you to explore the app before deciding on a subscription.

A subscription is necessary, as Replikant relies on external AI services like ChatGPT and ElevenLabs. This cost primarily covers those services rather than being a charge from us. AI service prices are decreasing, so this will evolve over time.

Steam labels our app’s download button as "Free to Play," though we prefer "Demo" to better reflect the experience. The official category for Replikant Chat is "Simulation," not "Free to Play." Thank you for your understanding!

Unleash the possibilities:

  • User-Friendly Interface: our extraordinary 3D characters, navigating them with ease through an interface as familiar as your favorite streaming service.

  • Connect in real-time with one or more characters, each uniquely crafted with rich personalities, expressive voices, and captivating animations that bring them to life.

  • Diverse Content: a vast array of topics, from education and entertainment to quizzes, relationships, comedy, and storytelling—each conversation a new adventure.

  • Immersive Environments: yourself in highly realistic 3D environments, where cinematic camera angles make every interaction feel like a scene from your favorite movie.

  • Witness the magic as real and AI-generated images seamlessly blend within these dynamic 3D stages, enhancing every narrative and communication.

  • Real-Time Interaction: like never before—our characters see you through your webcam and respond to your world in real-time, creating a deeply personal and interactive experience.

  • Multimedia Integration: your world with them—whether it’s documents or images, our characters are ready to access, display, and discuss anything you bring to the table.

  • Stay inspired with regular updates and new characters, ensuring that your journey with us is always fresh, exciting, and full of surprises.

Our platform doesn't just offer conversations; it creates immersive, interactive experiences that push the boundaries of AI technology. Whether you're seeking knowledge, entertainment, or a unique way to explore ideas, our 3D chatbot experience opens up a world of possibilities.

Embark on this journey where technology meets imagination, and every interaction is an opportunity to learn, be entertained, and explore the vast potential of AI-driven communication.

name: Replikant Chat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD is needed
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen-7 or above
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3070 or faster
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD is needed

short_description: Engage with unique AI characters, each with distinct personalities, in immersive 3D environments. Currently in Early Access, a subscription is required for the full experience. Discover a growing roster of educational, entertaining, gaming, narrative, and creative interactions.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Simplified Chinese*, Italian*, Dutch*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
